title: I want it... Heartseeker Quinn
body:
http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/22/1464639530-tumblr-nhu53oom6m1s9gkk6o1-1280.jpg

This skin idea is just amazing. 

I was really surprised and disappointed that Riot didn't made more Heartseeker ADCarry, to keep the tradition.

So I'm askin it now, Can you, Riot Games, release this awesome skin ? Please?{{item:3070}} {{champion:133}} {{item:3070}} 


... Oh... I forgot to say that Quinn is bae.

hope that skin comes out with a rework
she got one with marksman update

she got one that made me stop playing her, still hoping she get a new rework

Make Quinn And Valor Great Again

> [{quoted}](name=kaltenashes,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Ys1nVBK,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-05-31T01:20:17.054+0000)
>
> she got one that made me stop playing her, still hoping she get a new rework
> 
> Make Quinn And Valor Great Again

Note the "And" in there. We can't forget about Valor
if shes bad why bother asking for a skin im getting mixed signals from quinn mains :/

Skins = good

Doesn't matter if you don't like how they currently are, skins are always fun.
As a Quinn main - _the skin.. Doesn't.. Rly.. Fit.. Her.. Personality.._
Renekton- a magical alligator/borderline god-being- from the desert- has a pool party skin.

That kind of skin can fit his thematics.

Quinn is a dutiful woman who scouts the Demacian borders with Valor being like a brother for him. 
In many attributes, she is a stronger person than most male champions in league. 

Imagine garen posing in lingerie? Quinn is not soft, she can be anything but she is not soft. 

That's why I highly dislike this kind of skins made for her.
You have a good point, but then again Vayne exactly fits your description of Quinn.
Hurr, you are right xD Although  HS Vayne's splash still remains 'tough' in some way. I didn't criticize the HS skin idea itself but more like the portrait depicted by OP _gasp_
That one and this one should so be made  http://i.imgur.com/V8AB9pm.png

You shouldn't HAVE to say Quinn is bae. It's fairly self-evident.

AlsothisskinRitopls!

I would like Heartseeker Graves..... I already have pool party but for the love of GOD he's such a beefcake.

*sigh* a man can dream....
I could imagine him looking really embarrassed in his heartseeker outfit splash
Pulling a cowboy hat down over his face to hide the blush.... unf I need to draw this.
Yasuo tho
He is pretty sexy, not gonna lie.
